entry.title: Litecoin Price Spikes After CFTC Calls It Commodity Alongside Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: Litecoin defied the sluggish markets Friday and has spiked 11% over the past 24 hours, second only behind surging meme coin Dogwifhat (WIF).

entry.title: Here's Every Upcoming Marvel Game You Shouldn't Miss
entry.summary: UPDATE: Marvel Rivals puts a superhero spin on the Overwatch team shooter, plus Marvel's 1943: Rise of Hydra has been fully revealed.

entry.title: Biggest Crypto Gaming Tokens Launched in 2024—So Far
entry.summary: UPDATED: We've added Gaimin (GMRX) and Apeiron (APRS) to the list. Which new gaming token has made the biggest impact so far in 2024?

entry.title: Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin Pushes 'Positive-Sum' Vision for Meme Coins
entry.summary: Arguing that current meme coins "go up and down in price and contribute nothing of value," Buterin suggested harnessing that energy for good.

entry.title: Detained Binance Exec Sues Nigerian Goverment Over Human Rights Violations
entry.summary: Binance's Head of Financial Crime Compliance Tigran Gambaryan demanded an apology from Nigeria's ONSA and EFCC.

entry.title: SBF Sentencing
entry.summary: BTC: 70.7k (+1%), ETH: 3585 (0%), SOL: 186 (-1%). Top 100 gainers: DOGE, GT, BCH, RBN. Crypto mixed, BTC-beta & memes outperform. SEC case vs Coinbase set to go to trial. DeFi win as case dismissed vs Coinbase wallet. ETFs see $244m inflows led by Ark. BlackRock ETF fastest growing in history: Fink. ETH ETF possible even if its a security: Fink. ETH spot ETF by May chances only 20%: GSR. SBF sentencing today, faces 50 years.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Wobble Heading Into the Weekend
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum hit some volatility and are trading 1% lower than they were yesterday while WIF continues to rule the memes.

entry.title: What’s Next for Ethereum NFT Game ‘Parallel’ and Solana's ‘Colony’ After $35 Million Raise
entry.summary: Parallel Studios just revealed a $35 million raise after launching the card battler in open beta. Here's how it will use the funding.

entry.title: Dogwifhat Hits All-Time High, Flips Pepe as Meme Coins Soar
entry.summary: Meme coins are doing extremely well in the middle of a flat market, and WIF is having its best day ever.

entry.title: 'Som Bonkmon Fraud': SBF Meme Coins Pump 300x, Then Crash After Sentencing
entry.summary: A tale—like fraud—as old as time: Meme coins inspired by disgraced FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried pumped and dumped amid courtroom drama.

entry.title: Bitwise Enters Race for Ethereum Spot ETF
entry.summary: The move comes after the firm's Chief Investment Officer said delayed approvals would be better for the market.

entry.title: These AI Tokens Are All Up Over 30% This Week Amid Plans to Merge
entry.summary: Fetch AI, SingularityNET, and Ocean Protocol soar as their respective communities prepare to vote on their collective future.

entry.title: Next-Gen Xbox Preview: Everything You Need to Know About the Console and Crypto Plans
entry.summary: UPDATE: Photos of Microsoft's next Xbox revision have allegedly leaked—and it doesn't look like we thought it would.

entry.title: Coppola-Backed Decentralized Pictures to Launch DCP+ Film Streaming Service
entry.summary: The in-app streaming service will enable DCP creators to distribute their content fairly, with on-chain revenue distribution.

entry.title: 'Call of Duty' Players Have Their Bitcoin Swiped Thanks to Malware
entry.summary: Over 4.9 million total gaming accounts could be affected by the Bitcoin wallet-draining malware tied to "cheat" software.

entry.title: Inside the Courtroom Where Sam Bankman-Fried Was Sentenced to 25 Years Behind Bars
entry.summary: Persistent rain, BitBoy in a suit, a rambling victim, a less-than-sorry Sam Bankman-Fried, and a judge’s excoriating rebuke.

entry.title: Where Will Sam Bankman-Fried Be Sent to Prison? The Options Are Bleak
entry.summary: A 25-year sentence means SBF will likely be sent to a medium-security prison. That’s bad news for the disgraced FTX co-founder.

entry.title: Bitcoin or MicroStrategy Stock? Analyst Says MSTR Trades at ‘Unjustifiable Premium’ Over BTC
entry.summary: The Kerrisdale investment firm says that the software company's stock will take a hit because its price is now unjustified.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading Flat While Dogecoin Dominates the Market
entry.summary: Heavyweights like Bitcoin and Ethereum are cooling off, but Dogecoin spiked to its highest price since 2021 and other coins are gaining.

entry.title: AI Analytics Firm Helika Launches $50 Million Crypto Gaming Accelerator
entry.summary: Helika Accelerate aims to boost blockchain gaming studios with AI-driven guidance plus funding from Pantera, Spartan Capital, and others.

entry.title: The $63 Million Exploit
entry.summary: BTC consolidates around $70k, funding still low. ETFs see $418m inflow as GBTC outflow tiny. BTC set to have record 7th-straight green month. AI coins soar, FET hits ATH amid merger rumour. FET, OCEAN, AGIX token proposed at $7.5bn FDV. DoJ charges KuCoin over money laundering. KuCoin sees $800m outflows after charges. CFTC names ETH & LTC commodities in charges. HK set to allow ‘in-kind’ style ETFs. HSBC launches tokenised gold fund. Fidelity files S1 form for ETH ETF. Short sellers bet $11bn crypto rally won’t last. More customer USDC balances to be stored on Base.

entry.title: BTC Is Back On Top
entry.summary: BTC breaks $70K as $175M of shorts liquidated. ETFs see net inflow despite high GBTC outflows. Gold miner set to buy $1.7B BTC. UK to list crypto ETNs in May. ETH ETF may still be approved: Grayscale. Grayscale ETH discount falls to 22%. ETH ETF has no positive signs: Bloomberg. Coinbase pumps 10%, Ark continue to sell shares. Coinbase Int. record trading volumes in March. FTX to sell majority of Anthropic stake for $884M. Trader makes $20m profit in MEW rally. Puppets hit ATH, lead move higher in Ordinals. Azuki flips MAYC market cap in bounce. Magic Eden makes $15m in 30d trading revenue.

entry.title: SBF Sentenced to 25 Years in Prison—How Many Will He Actually Serve?
entry.summary: Disgraced crypto founder Sam Bankman-Fried could be stuck in prison for decades, experts say, with little wiggle room.

entry.title: FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried Sentenced to 25 Years in Prison
entry.summary: A New York jury previously convicted Sam Bankman-Fried in November on seven counts of fraud, money laundering, and conspiracy.

entry.title: Base On Top
entry.summary: Majors continue to rally as ETF sentiment improves. Genesis have likely sold half their GBTC position. BlackRock could flip GBTC holdings in 3 weeks. BTC short squeeze would liquidate $6.6bn by $75k. Lack of on-chain activity indicates ‘limited selling’. BTC crucial to the financial system: BlackRock. Resurging interest in crypto assets: Goldman Sachs. Crypto summer has started: Raoul Pal. Base outpaces SOL & ETH for trading volumes.

entry.title: Degen Chain Debuts on Base as 'Blockchain Equivalent of Las Vegas'
entry.summary: The community-first blockchain is built with a mix of tech from Arbitrum to Base and tapping layer-3 tools from Syndicate.

entry.title: Big Time Generates over $100M in Revenue since Preseason
entry.summary: Austin, United States, March 28th, 2024, Chainwire Innovative game developer Big Time Studios announces that its highly anticipated free-to-play multiplayer action/MMO RPG Big Time, has generated $100M in revenue. According to the team, players transacted a total volume of over $230M, without selling a single token. “Success in Web3 gaming hinges on creating compelling […]

entry.title: Final Bitcoin Options Expiry Before Halving Is Here—What You Need to Know
entry.summary: Approximately $15 billion worth of Bitcoin open interest contracts expire tomorrow—the last monthly expiry ahead of the next BTC halving—across derivatives exchanges CME, Derebit, OKX, Binance and Bybit, according to CoinGlass. For Derebit, this March 29 expiry accounts for roughly 40% the $26.3 billion worth of total Bitcoin open interest on the platform—"one of the […]

entry.title: Dogecoin Jumps 10% to Clear $0.20 for First Time Since 2021
entry.summary: The dog-themed meme coin has jumped by double-digits in the past week to reclaim price levels not seen since December 2021.

entry.title: BlackRock's BUIDL Ethereum Fund Draws $245 Million In a Week
entry.summary: Starting with $5 million, BlackRock's BUIDL Ethereum fund now boasts $245 million since it launched on March 20.

entry.title: Anthropic's Claude AI Overthrows ChatGPT on Chatbot Arena Leaderboard
entry.summary: The rankings are based on blind ratings of chatbot response quality, and Open AI had been on top for nearly a year.

entry.title: Massive Bitcoin ETF Growth Will ‘Continue for Years’, Says Bitwise CIO
entry.summary: Even amid monstrous ETF demand, experts say institutional investment in Bitcoin has barely even begun.

entry.title: There Are Now 11 Bitcoin ETFs Trading as One More Launches
entry.summary: Originally a Bitcoin Futures ETF, Hashdex now offers direct Bitcoin market exposure starting with 5,500 BTC.

entry.title: ETF Outflows Continue
entry.summary: Despite Bitcoin's decline, several alternative cryptocurrencies remain robust. Fantom (FTM) emerges as the top-performing Layer 1 blockchain, while Coinbase introduces futures trading. Exchange-traded funds (ETFs) witness a $94 million outflow, although outflows from Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) may decelerate. Approximately $1 billion worth of Bitcoin shorts face liquidation if prices reach $67.8k. Coinbase's premium resurfaces, marking the first occurrence since Bitcoin's all-time high. Bitcoin continues its streak with seven consecutive months of positive performance. Solana's (SOL) decentralized exchange (DEX) achieves a monthly volume of $50 billion, with revenue soaring 30-fold. OKX announces support for a new Solana token standard. Despite expectations, Layer 2 activity remains sluggish post-Dencun, according to Vitalik Buterin.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin Discusses Ethereum's Dencun Upgrade and More at ETH Taipei 2024
entry.summary: Ethereum creator Vitalik Buterin answers questions from Rug Radio and other media outlets at ETH Taipei 2024. He discusses the recent Dencun network upgrade and a variety of other topics. (Credit: Rug Radio/Decrypt)

entry.title: The Weekend Madness
entry.summary: Bitcoin rebounds as users withdraw funds from exchanges. Solana breaks $200, surpassing Binance Coin to claim the 4th spot in crypto rankings. Ethereum's supply drops to a two-year low. Over $100 million raised by new coin presales in just two days. A dog NFT sells for a staggering $4.3 million. PRIME emerges as the leader in gaming coins, while NodeMonkes flips Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC).

entry.title: BOME Blast off
entry.summary: BTC experiences a 9% drop, resulting in $700 million liquidations, with funding and open interest hitting their lowest levels in weeks. The sell-off appears more sustained compared to previous brief dips, with most BTC downside liquidations concentrated around $66,000. ETFs witness $132 million inflows, sparking predictions of a potential liquidity crisis within six months. VanEck suggests that an ETH ETF could surpass BTC in size. Grayscale's ETH discount doubles within a week. Meanwhile, SOL's market cap reaches an all-time high amid a frenzy surrounding memecoins. Additionally, rumors circulate about a fund losing $1 billion on the BTC-MicroStrategy basis.

entry.title: This is The Time of SOL
entry.summary: ETFs match last week’s inflows in just 3 days. ETH Dencun upgrade goes, ETH coins broadly fall. ETH L2 costs for trading decrease dramatically. SOL nears $100bn FDV as activity soars. SOL DEX volume now 3x ETH mainnet. MicroStrategy plans $500m raise to buy more BTC. Franklin Templeton releases memecoin paper. AEVO faces FUD about tokenomics.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits ATH Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin hits a new high at $73.1k with a 2% increase, while Ethereum remains steady at $4050 and Solana sees a similar surge to $154. TON, RBN, RUNE, and QNT emerge as top gainers, capturing market attention. BTC's unprecedented rise is fueled by a record $1 billion in ETF inflows, coinciding with Ethereum's Dencun upgrade promising significant changes for Layer 2 solutions.

entry.title: CPI COMES IN, BTC HOLDS 72
entry.summary: Bitcoin (BTC) at $72k and Ethereum (ETH) at $4035, both up 1%. Solana (SOL) rises 3% to $152. Leading gains: TON, XRP, IOTA, FLOW. Bitcoin nears record high with significant ETF investments. Solana sees spike in new users. TON surges 30% with Telegram IPO rumors. Ark Invest offloads $69m in Coinbase stock. Predictions: Bitcoin could outdo gold, potentially reaching $150k. Blast platform's value hits $3bn with higher yields. Biden proposes crypto miner tax. El Salvador profits $84m from Bitcoin. Monad plans $200m raise led by Paradigm.

entry.title: BITCOIN HITS $72,000!
entry.summary: BTC hits new ATH of $72k, flips Silver market cap. Wick lower then higher causes $350m liquidations. London Stock Exchange to consider crypto ETNs. Funding again soars before ETF buying begins. Crypto saw record $2.7bn inflows last week. MicroStrategy buys another $821m of BTC.

entry.title: BTC HITS 70K!
entry.summary: ETF net inflows hit $472m in strong week. GBTC outflows hit $10bn, nearly overtaken by new 9. BlackRock to allow more funds to buy BTC ETFs. Rumours still of Qatar buying amid Bukele meeting.

entry.title: Live With Raoul Pal
entry.summary: SOL up 10%, Pantera raising $250m to buy from FTX. Market flat but spot buyers begin to drive volumes.

entry.title: Streamlining Blockchain: Demystifying Real-Time Insights & Simplifying Data Management
entry.summary: Discover how to navigate and overcome the complexities of blockchain data management with QuickNode’s Streams. This webinar, guided by our seasoned experts Nick Yushkevich and Carl DiClementi, provides you with actionable insights into tackling common challenges faced by businesses in the blockchain space. From real-time data streaming that ensures timely decision-making to robust error handling mechanisms that guarantee data integrity, and comprehensive observability features that offer deep insights into your blockchain operations, we’ll cover how QuickNode’s infrastructure is tailored to enhance operational efficiency, scalability, and innovation.

entry.title: DOGS ON TOP!
entry.summary: ETFs see another $562m net inflow. Fear & Greed hits 90, was above for months in 2021. ETH leads majors, beta-plays take lead in altcoins. BlackRock to start buying BTC in its largest fund. MicroStrategy plans $600m capital raise to buy BTC. BTC flips market cap of Silver. WIF to be listed on Binance, rises 20%. PEPE & WIF mentioned on Bloomberg. Alien Punk sells for $16m, ‘NFTs not dead’. 3 more large NFT sales for $500K.

entry.title: Interview: How SocialFi Will Transform Crypto Farming Game 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Pixels founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss how the Ronin-based farming game will be transformed through the addition of guilds and changes to resource generation. They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.
